article_title: Al Jazeera Says One of Its Journalists Is Detained in Germany at Request of Egypt
article_text:
FRANKFURT—News organization Al Jazeera said on Saturday that one its journalists has been detained by police at Berlin’s Tegel Airport at the request of Egyptian authorities.

Al Jazeera’s made the news known in an article on its website. In a statement attached the to article, the journalist—Ahmed Mansour—said he had been detained at the request of the Egyptians.

According to Al Jazeera, Cairo’s criminal court sentenced Mr....
